PostToolUse.description: Validate production code standards after file modifications

hooks.prompt: Review the code just written. Check for violations of production-code-standards: TODO/FIXME comments, empty catch blocks, console.log statements, hardcoded values, or fallback patterns hiding errors. If violations exist, flag them for immediate correction before continuing.

PostToolUse.description: Validate epic closure prerequisites before marking epic as Done

hooks.prompt: If this update is marking an EPIC as Done (not a regular ticket), verify: 1) All sub-tickets are Done or Cancelled, 2) No workarounds or temporary solutions were shipped, 3) Business value was delivered. Epic closure requires all sub-tickets complete. If any sub-ticket is incomplete, BLOCK the epic closure and report which tickets need attention.

Stop.description: Remind about Linear ticket updates when workflow commands were used

hooks.prompt: Before stopping: If this session used workflow commands (/adaptation, /implementation, /testing, /documentation, /codereview, /security-review) on a Linear ticket, remind the user to verify the ticket status is updated. If no workflow commands or Linear tickets were involved, approve stopping without comment.

SessionStart.description: Inject PM workflow context and skill reminders at session start
